77 
78 struct Id {
79 
80  enum Reserved {
81  ModuleBase = 1, //< >= ModuleBase: modules
82  Invalid = 0,
83  Vistle = -1, //< session parameters
84  Broadcast = -2, //< master is broadcasting to all modules/hubs
85  ForBroadcast = -3, //< to master for broadcasting
86  NextHop = -4,
87  UI = -5,
88  LocalManager = -6,
89  LocalHub = -7,
90  MasterHub = -8, //< < MasterHub: slave hubs
91  };
92 
93  static bool isHub(int id) { return id <= Id::LocalHub; }
94  static bool isModule(int id) { return id >= Id::ModuleBase; }
95 };
96

98 
99  public:

101  static void init(int id, int rank);

104  static int rank();

106  private:
107  int m_id;
108  int m_rank;

112 class V_COREEXPORT MessageFactory {
113 
114 public:
115  MessageFactory(int id = Id::Invalid, int rank = -1);
116 
117  int id() const;
118  void setId(int id);
119  int rank() const;
120  void setRank(int rank);
121 
122  template<class M, class... P>
123  M message(P&&... p) const {
124  M m(std::forward<P>(p)...);
125  m.setSenderId(m_id);
126  m.setRank(m_rank);
127  return m;
128  }
129 
130 private:
131  int m_id = Id::Invalid;
132  int m_rank = -1;
133 };

149 class V_COREEXPORT Message {
150  // this is POD
151 
152  public:
153  static const size_t MESSAGE_SIZE = 1024; // fixed message size is imposed by boost::interprocess::message_queue
154 
155  Message(const Type type, const unsigned int size);
156  // Message (or its subclasses) may not require destructors
157 
159  unsigned long typeFlags() const;
160 
162  void setUuid(const uuid_t &uuid);
164  const uuid_t &uuid() const;
166  void setReferrer(const uuid_t &ref);
168  const uuid_t &referrer() const;
170  Type type() const;
172  int senderId() const;
174  void setSenderId(int id);
176  int rank() const;
178  void setRank(int rank);
180  int uiId() const;
182  size_t size() const;
184  bool isForBroadcast() const;
186  void setForBroadcast(bool enable=true);
188  bool wasBroadcast() const;
190  void setWasBroadcast(bool enable=true);
192  bool isNotification() const;
194  void setNotify(bool enable);
195 
197  int destId() const;
199  void setDestId(int id);
200 
202  int destRank() const;
204  void setDestRank(int r);
206  int destUiId() const;
208  void setDestUiId(int id);
210  size_t payloadSize() const;
212  void setPayloadSize(size_t size);
214  CompressionMode payloadCompression() const;
216  void setPayloadCompression(CompressionMode mode);
218  size_t payloadRawSize() const;
220  void setPayloadRawSize(size_t size);
221 
222  template<class SomeMessage>
223  SomeMessage &as() { SomeMessage *m = static_cast<SomeMessage *>(this); assert(m->type()==SomeMessage::s_type); return *m; }
224  template<class SomeMessage>
225  SomeMessage const &as() const { const SomeMessage *m = static_cast<const SomeMessage *>(this); assert(m->type()==SomeMessage::s_type); return *m; }
226 
227  private:
229  Type m_type;
231  unsigned int m_size;
233  int m_senderId;
235  int m_rank;
237  int m_destId;
239  int m_destRank;
241  uuid_t m_uuid;
243  uuid_t m_referrer;
244  protected:
246  uint64_t m_payloadSize;
248  uint64_t m_payloadRawSize;
250  int m_payloadCompression;
252  bool m_forBroadcast, m_wasBroadcast;
254  bool m_notification;
256  char m_pad[1];
257 };
258 // ensure alignment
259 static_assert(sizeof(Message) % sizeof(double)==0, "not padded to ensure double alignment");

261 class V_COREEXPORT Buffer: public Message {
262 
263  public:
264  Buffer(): Message(ANY, Message::MESSAGE_SIZE) {
265  memset(payload.data(), 0, payload.size());
266  }
267  Buffer(const Message &message): Message(message) {
268  memset(payload.data(), 0, payload.size());
269  memcpy(payload.data(), (char *)&message+sizeof(Message), message.size()-sizeof(Message));
270  }
271  const Buffer &operator=(const Buffer &rhs) {
272  *static_cast<Message *>(this) = rhs;
273  memcpy(payload.data(), rhs.payload.data(), payload.size());
274  return *this;
275  }
276 
277  template<class SomeMessage>
278  SomeMessage &as() { SomeMessage *m = static_cast<SomeMessage *>(static_cast<Message *>(this)); assert(m->type()==SomeMessage::s_type); return *m; }
279  template<class SomeMessage>
280  SomeMessage const &as() const { const SomeMessage *m = static_cast<const SomeMessage *>(static_cast<const Message *>(this)); assert(m->type()==SomeMessage::s_type); return *m; }
281 
282  size_t bufferSize() const { return Message::MESSAGE_SIZE; }
283  size_t size() const { return Message::size(); }
284  char *data() { return static_cast<char *>(static_cast<void *>(this)); }
285  const char *data() const { return static_cast<const char *>(static_cast<const void *>(this)); }
286 
287  private:
288  std::array<char, Message::MESSAGE_SIZE - sizeof(Message)> payload;
289 
290 };
291 static_assert(sizeof(Buffer) == Message::MESSAGE_SIZE, "message too large");
